devdoc.author: The Moonbeam Team

Delegated(uint16,address,address,uint256.details: An account delegated for the given trackId.

Undelegated(uint16,address).details: An account undelegated for the given trackId.

Unlocked(uint16,address).details: An account called to unlock tokens for the given trackId.

VoteRemoved(uint32,address).details: An account removed its vote from an ongoing poll.

VoteRemovedForTrack(uint32,uint16,addres.details: An account removed its vote from an ongoing poll.

VoteRemovedOther(uint32,address,address,.details: An account removed a vote from a poll.

params.caller: address Address of the origin caller.
params.target: address Address of the address which's vote is being removed.

VoteSplit(uint32,address,uint256,uint256.details: An account made a split vote in a poll.

VoteSplitAbstained(uint32,address,uint25.details: An account made a split abstain vote in a poll.

Voted(uint32,address,bool,uint256,uint8).details: An account made a vote in a poll.

params.aye: bool Is it a vote for or against the poll.

classLocksFor(address).details: Retrieve class locks for a given account.

delegate(uint16,address,uint8,uint256).details: Delegate to a representative for the vote trackId

params.amount: delegated to representative for this vote trackId

removeVoteForTrack(uint32,uint16).details: Remove vote in poll for track

params.conviction: Conviction multiplier for length of vote lock

voteSplitAbstain(uint32,uint256,uint256,.details: Vote split abstain in a poll.

params.conviction: Conviction multiplier for length of vote lock

votingFor(address,uint16).details: Retrieve votings for a given account and track.

devdoc.title: Pallet Conviction Voting InterfaceThe interface through which solidity contracts will interact with the Conviction Voting pallet
